channel.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, for south west
channel.description: The latest traffic information for England's motorway and trunk routes provided by the Highways Agency.

image.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, for south west

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: A46 northbound between M5 and B4079 | Northbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the A46 from The M5 towards Coventry between the junctions with the M5 and the A435 Tewkesbury, minor delays are possible due to roadworks . Expect disruption until 5:00 am.
